price: 17. O tie, kurie priima pamokymą, Jis sustiprina jų vedimą (į tiesą) ir suteikia jiems dievobaimingumą.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
